reg_info.act_under: Small Business Development Corporations Act   Loi sur les sociétés pour l’expansion des petites entreprises

content.content: 1.A proposal referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1.A proposal referred to in section 3 of the Act shall be in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 1.

content.content: 2.A certificate of registration referred to in section 6 of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2.A certificate of registration referred to in section 6 of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 2.

content.content: 3.The certificate referred to in clause 20 (3) (a) or 21 (2) (a) of the Act or an application for, (a) a grant under subsection 20 (1) or (6) of the Act; or (b) a tax credit under section 21 of the Act, shall be, (c) in Form 3, where a person or corporation acquired equity shares of a small business development corporation before the 24th day of October, 1985; or (d) in Form 4, where a person or corporation acquires equity shares of a small business development corporation on or after the 24th day of October, 1985. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3.The certificate referred to in clause 20 (3) (a) or 21 (2) (a) of the Act or an application for,

(a) a grant under subsection 20 (1) or (6) of the Act; or

(b) a tax credit under section 21 of the Act,

shall be,

(c) in Form 3, where a person or corporation acquired equity shares of a small business development corporation before the 24th day of October, 1985; or

(d) in Form 4, where a person or corporation acquires equity shares of a small business development corporation on or after the 24th day of October, 1985. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 3.

content.content: 4.A notification of material change in investments under subsection 13 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4.A notification of material change in investments under subsection 13 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 4.

content.content: 5.A notification of proposed corporate action under subsection 16 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5.A notification of proposed corporate action under subsection 16 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 6. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 5.

content.content: 6.A notice of objection under section 28 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6.A notice of objection under section 28 of the Act shall be in Form 7. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 6.

content.content: 7.A return under subsection 16 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 7. FORM 7 Small Business Development Corporations Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, Form 7. FORM 8 Small Business Development Corporations Act       R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, Form 8.
content.raw_html:
7.A return under subsection 16 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 8. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1019, s. 7.
